name: Fehppy Bird
description:
Fan game made for fun in one afternoon.

Idea from a comic by somelameguy on reddit:

https://www.reddit.com/r/FireEmblemHeroes/comments/7ueir0/the_future_of_feh/

Music by www.abstractionmusic.com

I do not intend to profit with this. I own nothing in this piece of software. If there's any copyright issues, I will take this down.
